User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110722165219

Steps to reproduce:

How can I see full folder name in titlebar in TB - for example:

Folder`s tree:

Local folders (account)
       |-2011 (folder)
          |-July (subfolder)
             |-25 (subsubfolder)

Titlebar I see now:

25 - Local folders

Titlebar I want:

25 - July - 2011 - Local folders
